Texts.Chs: 使用矛和斧系武器时，其基础攻击力增加至115%。
Texts.Eng: 115% Base Power with Spear or Axe-like Weapons.

Texts.Chs: 出血几率和时长与力量相关。
Texts.Eng: Bleed Chance and Length scales with Strength.

Texts.Chs: 可以双持近战武器，可以装备双手近战武器。
Texts.Eng: Can Dual-Wield Melee Weapons and Wield Two-Handed Melee Weapons.

Texts.Chs: 用恶魔伤害击中敌人有23%的几率使其陷入腐化。被腐化的敌人会向附近的敌人辐射恶魔伤害。
Texts.Eng: Hitting enemies with Demonic Damage has a 30% chance to corrupt them. Corrupted enemies radiate Demonic Damage to nearby enemies.

Texts.Chs: 按[H]（在按键设置中绑定[H]）发动。立即牺牲33%的最大生命值，对附近的敌人造成恶魔伤害，并获得15%的攻击机加成。激活时: HP消耗率为0.5%最大HP+2HP每秒；攻击增幅在30秒内稳步增加到100% ；出血伤害以3比1的比率回复生命；在技能发动期间你对恢复状态免疫。
Texts.Eng: Press [H] (Bind [H] in your Controls) to toggle, immediately sacrificing 33% Max Health, dealing Demonic Damage to nearby enemies, and gaining +15% Power. While active: Health drains at a rate of 0.5% Max Health + 2 Health per Second; Power increases steadily up to 100% in 30 seconds; Bleed Damage dealt regens Health at a rate of 3 Damage to 1 Health; and you are immune to Healing Status.
